name: Defend'INN
description:
A weary merchant happens across your ramshackle inn. A fateful day in your normally modest life as an innkeeper. Stave off evil monsters at night using the magical tiles that the merchant gave you. Vanquish the monsters to find the source of this evil.  How to Play:
  • Swap tiles around in your inventory. 
  • Connect 3 or more of the same tiles to cast a spell. 
  • Watch out for the incoming monster attacks they will perform.
  • Collect monster souls to trade with the merchant to upgrade your inventory.
